comments.close:
Thanks for the report! This fork focuses on maintaining core compatibility and fixing reproducible bugs. This issue looks like a support/how-to question, an outdated install problem, or a feature request we are not planning to implement here, so I'm going to close it to keep the tracker focused.

If you can provide a minimal reproducible example and can show it's a bug in imgaug2 (not environment-specific), feel free to open a new issue with: versions, small code snippet, and expected vs actual behavior.
comments.duplicate: Thanks! Closing as a duplicate of #{canonical}.
comments.review: Marking for maintainer review: this may be a real bug or a docs gap. Please add a minimal reproducible example (inputs + augmenter + expected vs actual) and versions if you haven't already.
